name: LD43 - Lemmings'like
description:
Submission for LudumDare 43 : Sacrifices must be made

It's a Lemmings like game.

Made alone in around 20h, 

basic features are finished ... no more available time for me to make lot of level and some new mecanics that i have in mind ... ( dynamic environment , ennemies, new actions ... ) but its playable so i submit it :)

Code : Haxe, Kha, VSCode
